titleStmt.title: The iudges scripture, or, Gods charge to charge-givers A sermon preached in St. Nicholas Church of Newcastle upon Tyne, before the judges, justices, and gentlemen of the towne and countrey, at the assises holden there the three and twentieth day of July. 1635. By Francis Gray, Master of Arts, and one of the preachers in the same towne.
titleStmt.author: Gray, Francis.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Augustine Mathewes?] for Robert Milbourne, and are to be sold at the signe of the Vnicorne neere to Fleet-bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
